characters.name: Sakuta Azusagawa
characters.description:
**Height:**  172 cm (5'7")

A strange 2nd year student in high school, who doesn't have a cellphone in this day and age. He is currently an outcast at school due to rumors of a violent past... but doesn't seem to care.
~!Sakuta eventually starts dating Mai Sakurajima!~
(Source: Aniplex USA)

characters.name: Mai Sakurajima
characters.description:
__Height:__ 162 cm (5'4")

A 3rd-year student at Minegahara High School. She is serious and polite, but has a strong will.

Well known, famous actress, who is currently on hiatus. Because her life had always revolved around her work in entertainment, she remains isolated at school.

(Source: Aniplex USA)

characters.name: Tomoe Koga
characters.description:
__Height:__ 150 cm (4'11")

A typical 1st year high-school student at Minegahara High School who can take hints, but is slightly scatterbrained. Being overly concerned about how people look at her, she hides her Hakata accent, which comes out when she panics or is relaxed.

(Source: Aniplex USA, edited)

characters.name: Rio Futaba
characters.description:
__Height__: 155cm (5'1")
__Talent:__ Explaining any strange phenomenon with science

She is Sakuta's classmate, who is always cool and calm, always willing to give various advice on puberty syndrome. She is also the sole member of the Science Club, and known as an eccentric person at the school. 

(Source: Aniplex USA)

characters.name: Nodoka Toyohama
characters.description:
__Height:__ 158cm (5'2")
__Talent:__ Changing clothes quickly

Mai's half-sister, related through her father. A member of the idol group "Sweet Bullet" and designated as the most fashionable within the group. Despite her flashy looks, she attends an elite all girls' high school. She is confident and can be competitive.

(Source: Aniplex USA)

characters.name: Kaede Azusagawa
characters.description:
__Height:__ 5'4" (162 cm)

She is the younger sister of Sakuta Azusagawa. 

~!Suffered amnesia and gained a different personality after her ordeal with Adolescence Syndrome stemming from online bullying. Since then, she has lived with Sakuta and has not attended school.!~

characters.name: Shouko Makinohara
characters.description:
__Height:__ 150cm (4'11")
__Talent:__ Early to bed, early to rise

A girl who has the same first and last name as Sakuta's first crush. She is a shy middle school girl, but reliable and kind.

She bumps into Sakuta, while holding an umbrella over an abandoned cat in the rain.

~!It is later revealed that the older Shouko that Sakuta encounters is from the future, and is able to return to the past due to her puberty syndrome.!~

(Source: Aniplex USA)

characters.name: Saki Kamisato
characters.description:
[Yuuma](https://anilist.co/character/130307/Yuuma-Kunimi)'s girlfriend. Popular within the school and can be a standoffish person, but she shows great affection towards Yuuma. She is quite protective of him and often clashes with [Sakuta](https://anilist.co/character/127221/Sakuta-Azusagawa) as a result.

~!It is revealed that Saki has an older sister whom her parents often compare her to, causing her to develop low self-esteem. Sakuta believes this to be the reason why she is so protective of Yuuma's image and her own, as in her eyes she already has a fragile self-image.!~

~!After graduating she attends the same college as Sakuta and goes into health studies, in the hopes of becoming a nurse in order to help Yuuma whenever she can due to his decision to partake in firefighter training.!~

characters.name: Yuuma Kunimi
characters.description: A good friend of [Sakuta Azusagawa](https://anilist.co/character/127221/Sakuta-Azusagawa) and [Rio Futaba](https://anilist.co/character/127633/Rio-Futaba), as well as the boyfriend of [Saki Kamisato](https://anilist.co/character/130304). He is a member of Minegahara High's basketball team, being quite athletic and popular within the school.

characters.name: Uzuki Hirokawa
characters.description: The lead singer of idol group Sweet Bullet. Her nickname is Zukky.

characters.name: Yousuke Maesawa
characters.description: A member of the school basketball team. He has an attractive and charming demeanor, but he is ultimately not above slandering other students. Maezawa has bad-mouthed all of his past girlfriends.

characters.name: Mai no Haha
characters.description: She is the mother of Mai Sakurajima.

characters.name: Nana Yoneyama
characters.description: She is a classmate of Tomoe Koga.

characters.name: Nodoka no Haha
characters.description: She is the mother of Nodoka Toyohama.
